titles.title: A bill to permit the use of certain funds for recovery and mitigation activities in the upper basin of the Missouri River, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

term.name: Federal aid to water resources development

bill.summary: 3/6/2006--Introduced. Permits the use of funds made available for recovery or mitigation activities in the lower basin of the Missouri River for such activities in the upper basin of that river.
